name: Banana Pudding V
author: Minnie
summary: Marietta gave this recipe to me. I changed the ingredients to low fat and sugar subsitute.   Low fat/low sugar banana pudding
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package lowfat cream cheese, softened
1 (8 ounce) container lite frozen whipped topping, thawed
3 (1 ounce) packages instant sugar-free vanilla pudding mix
1 (11 ounce) package Cookies, vanilla wafers, lower fat
directions: In a medium bowl, beat cream cheese with sour cream
Stir in whipped topping and vanilla
In a large bowl, combine pudding mix, sweetener and milk
Stir until sugar and mix are dissolved
In a large glass serving dish, layer pudding mixture, wafers and bananas until all ingredients are used
